content.body: Splitting out SharedArrayBuffer from ArrayBuffer is not as quick of a PR as I thought it was

hey all, was implementing url spec change https://github.com/whatwg/url/pull/771 in Gecko and was brought up that it seems odd the issue went from inner blob -> non-http(s). it could be useful to have an origin for extension and file URIs and unsure why the issue expanded in scope like that since it seemed to be only originally for inner blobs for OOM concerns. thanks! (cc annevk from issue)
content.formatted_body: hey all, was implementing url spec change https://github.com/whatwg/url/pull/771 in Gecko and was brought up that it seems odd the issue went from inner blob -> non-http(s). it could be useful to have an origin for extension and file URIs and unsure why the issue expanded in scope like that since it seemed to be only originally for inner blobs for OOM concerns. thanks! (cc annevk from issue)
